TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ExecutedRoutedEventHandler(object sender, ExecutedRoutedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ExecutedRoutedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ExecutedRoutedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ExecutedRoutedEventArgs)
public delegate void ExecutedRoutedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ExecutedRoutedEventArgs ^ e);
type ExecutedRoutedEventHandler = delegate of obj * ExecutedRoutedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 和 路由事件以及相关附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the and routed events, as well as related attached events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托包含 的实现逻辑。This delegate contains the implementation logic for a . 通过从命令分离实现逻辑，可从不同的源和类型调用命令，并实现命令逻辑的集中。Separating the implementation logic from the command allows the command to be invoked from different sources and types, and enables the centralization of command logic. 此委托还用于 和 ，这是实现许多命令基础结构的 类上的附加事件。This delegate is also used for and , which are attached events on the class that implements much of the commanding infrastructure. 但大多数实际处理程序将处理来自特定 的 事件，而不是在 级别工作。But most practical handlers will handle the events from a particular , rather than work at the level. 在 中，当你为通过执行的命令生成的路由事件编写事件处理程序时，通常会对以下属性感兴趣：Within , the following properties are generally of interest when you write an event handler for a routed event that results from an executed command: - 报告执行命令的目标。 reports the target where the command was executed. 执行命令后，还可以将 更常见的方式视为路由事件术语，作为引发路由事件的对象。Once the command is executed, you can also think of the more generally in routed event terms, as the object that raised a routed event. - 报告执行的命令。 reports the command that executed. 如果使用命令绑定并且编写可能处理多个命令的处理程序，则此属性很有用。This property is useful if you use command bindings and if you write handlers that potentially handle multiple commands. - 报告执行命令传递的任何特定于命令的参数。 reports any command-specific parameters that were passed by the executing command. 并非所有命令都使用或需要命令特定的参数。Not all commands use or expect command-specific parameters. - 报告由执行命令产生的路由事件是否已由路由中的其他元素处理。 reports whether the routed event that resulted from the executed command was already handled by a different element along the route. 对于路由事件处理程序，建议在处理事件时，让处理程序执行有意义的工作，以将 设置为 `true`。For routed event handlers, it is a recommended practice to have handlers that do meaningful work when handling the event to set to `true`. 这会阻止事件的典型处理程序再次沿着路由再次处理事件。This prevents typical handlers for the event from handling the event again further along the route. 有关处理路由事件的详细信息，请参阅将[路由事件标记为 "已处理" 和 "类处理](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling)"。For more information on handling routed events, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling). 此委托还表示 和 的处理程序，这些处理程序是实现许多命令基础结构的 类上的附加事件。This delegate also represents handlers for and , which are attached events on the class that implements much of the commanding infrastructure. 但大多数实际处理程序将处理来自特定 的 事件，而不是在 级别工作。But most practical handlers will handle the events from a particular , rather than work at the level. 有关命令的详细信息，请参阅[命令概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview)。For more information on commanding, see [Commanding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview). ## Examples 此示例创建一个 ，该在执行命令时设置目标的视觉对象属性。This example creates an that sets a visual property on the target when the command is executed. 该示例还包括同一命令的 。The example also includes the for the same command. [!code-csharp[Custom_RoutedCommand#Custom_RoutedCommandHandlers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Custom_RoutedCommand/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#custom_routedcommandhandlers)] [!code-vb[Custom_RoutedCommand#Custom_RoutedCommandHandlers](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Custom_RoutedCommand/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#custom_routedcommandhandlers)]
